06lGrVe_QUCMX3_xRTuang.text: How Dow the get the pizza to your house so fast??? It's still cooking when you open it! Brilliant service, but very pricey.

E_N37KokTcKVVddy8RD7iw.text: Arrived badly burnt, managed agreed to send another which was exactly the same. Terrible aggressive attitude, said it's 'just how they make them', pretended they were out of dough at 7pm so as not to send another. Even the delivery boy said he wouldn't eat it.
